trans-unit.source: The source of the event, an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand" /> event of an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand" /> de um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" />.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: Para saber mais sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis ASP.NET, confira <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Aplicativos Móveis & Sites com ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: When you create an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventHandler> delegate for an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventHandler> delegar uma <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> identificar o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> notifies the handler when an item event is generated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> notifica o manipulador quando um item de evento é gerado.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: A menos que você remova o representante, o manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre.
